turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, can I get A grande Black and White Mocha at the Starbucks on Algonquin Road?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, can you repeat the location one more time?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a Starbucks at 1532 East Algonquin Road.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, and you're black and white mocha, which size did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, Grande! any preference on the type of milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And this is going to be a hot beverage, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great! did you want whip cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so, i got a grande black and white mocha with 2% milk and no Whip. anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay! Give me a moment to send that over.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your order has been sent to your desired location. It will be ready for pickup in 5-8 mins.
